thread.title: Seoul kicks off mission to broker U.S.-North Korea talks

title: Seoul kicks off mission to broker U.S.-North Korea talks
text:
Seoul kicks off mission to broker U.S.-North Korea talks   01:16 
A South Korean delegation leaves for North Korea on Monday, aiming to bring the North and the United States together for talks in a bid to rein in Pyongyang's nuclear and missile program. Eve Johnson reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A South Korean delegation leaves for North Korea on Monday, aiming to bring the North and the United States together for talks in a bid to rein in Pyongyang's nuclear and missile program.
